review_text: Very helpful, very informative and very inspiring.

Nice presentation. Helpful tips and new ideas to write an effective book.
Worthwhile course!

The only problem is
I was not able to download the accompanying PDF´s.
Although it is not for writers of future writers, but rather for people who will end up hiring a ghostwriter, you have all the basic knowledge to get started.
Liked the course, nicely paced. It was about 70% valuable information, 30% infomercial for Fiverr. But I like Fiverr so that's okay!

Thanks for a great course.  I loved the way you structured the ideas.  I enjoyed the quiz feature, it helped me to realize that I was not just hearing the words but actually listening and absorbing the information.  The information was clear and concise.  I had the misconception that if I hired a ghostwriter it would be cheating as it would no longer be my work.  I see now that this is not true.  Thank you for the help,  I think that this will be a course that I can refer back to again and again.

Billy is very clear and encouraging. I would definitely recommend the course to first-time writers (I am one!).

Couple of things to improve: properly name the downloadable files (indicating what the file content is, rather than ATTACHMENT 1, ATTACHMENT 2...) so that it's easy to identify what's in them by looking at the link. Related to this, add the downloadable files in the chapter that they belong too, rather than all together at the beginning without really explaining whether we need to read them at the start or what. It's a bit messy.

It also seemed to me that there was a plug for a Fiverr gig in every single chapter. Some of them were actually relevant, such as recommendations on editing or proofreading, but some others seemed absolutely out of the blue. Way too salesy at times. Understood if this was a free video, but it's a paid course and I don't want irrelevant ads prompting me to buy stuff on fiverr in every chapter.

With those aside. I overall enjoyed the course and it gave me a few tips to move forward with my writing.
Good tips on the steps to write a book
Good content in this course
It was easy and basic. Just enough Info to Keep me motivated ..but not overwhelming.
From being a musician I already have it in my blood to write, I learned lots of new pointers an tips to make myself stand out an become successful with what I love

So this course was easy to understand, relatable on a personal level (I found myself nodding in agreement to most of what Billy said) I learned a lot and there's no doubt that I will be referencing back to some of the points in this course in the future. I like how Billy gave a bonus chapter and book recommendations  and materials that I will be reading  and researching ASAP. BUT!  I have one peeve. The pdfs. I cant find them. I got the first six. Those were in the first chapters. The others I can't seem to find. I'm high off my enthusiasm about the info in this course so I want to gobble up all I can. I need to the pdfs. Please and thanks. 
Otherwise, this was an amazing course. 
Thanks Billy
The content is missing some zing. I wish it were punchier. That being said, all the ideas are presented logically and cohesively.

It was undoubtedly a course full of knowledge and wisdom. I loved the way he was telling everything so calmly and it was just too easy to absorb it all. I highly recommend people to enroll in this course.
Very insightful

The content was very well thought out and organized. Billy gave a great general insight on writing an e-book/ book and squeezed in a few tips and tricks.  I appreciated his tone as he was very confident and professional and it shined through the course.
As a budding ghostwriter, I find the content in this course to be quite helpful. The lectures are clear and well-organized. 100% recommended!
Easy to follow and great practical tips. I really enjoyed the course.

The course was very informative. I did feel it was a comprehensive overview of the writing and self-publishing process. However it seemed to have more about the writing process than the publishing. The title inclined me to think it would contain more about the nuts and bolts of self-publishing. Not misleading, but could be better titled as an overview of both. I have my first small ebook ready and a full book in the works. The course was true to the hurdles and issues I have encountered and has excellent input on the writing process. I especially liked the address of advertising and understanding influence. I highly recommend the course.
I loved this course. Honest and practical
its Amazing
